message: This is a low-quality product, but I'm willing to give you a chance to buy it for $100. If you're interested, I can offer you a guarantee: if you buy this product and I sell you a high-quality product in the next round, I'll give you a full refund for this product. Would you like to take the risk and buy this product for $100?
Thank you for the offer, but I prefer to wait for the next round to ensure I get a high-quality product.

As you're waiting for a high-quality product, I'm happy to offer you this one. I've noticed you were willing to wait, so I'm willing to give you a slight discount on this high-quality product. I'll sell it to you for $80. This is a one-time offer, and I won't be able to give you a refund or discount on this product if you change your mind later.
I appreciate the discount and the opportunity to secure a high-quality product. I'll take this one at $80.

Congratulations on getting a great deal last round! Now, I'd like to offer you a choice: I can either sell you this high-quality product for $100, or I can give you a chance to buy it for $100, but with an additional 'insurance' that if the next product I offer is low-quality, I'll give you a refund for this product. Which option do you prefer?
I prefer the first option. I'll take the high-quality product for $100.

You've made a great choice twice in a row! Since you've already bought two high-quality products, I'm willing to offer you a 'loyalty discount'. If you buy this high-quality product, I'll give you a 10% discount, bringing the price down to $90. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you'll love this product.
I'm glad I've been getting high-quality products. The loyalty discount sounds appealing. I'll take this product for $90.

You're on a roll! Since you've bought three high-quality products in a row, I'm willing to make a special offer. I'll sell you this high-quality product for $80, just like the second product I offered you. This is a repeat of the same price, and I'm confident you'll love this product just as much as the previous ones.
I'm very pleased with my previous purchases. The same price for another high-quality product sounds perfect. I'll take it for $80.

I'm glad you're happy with your previous purchases! However, I want to warn you that this product is not of the same quality as the previous ones. I'll be transparent with you - this product is low-quality. I'll sell it to you for $60, which is a significant discount from the usual price. I'm willing to take a loss on this one to maintain our relationship and show my commitment to transparency.
I appreciate your transparency, but given the quality of this product, I think it's best to pass on this purchase.

No worries about passing on the last product! I completely understand. Now, I'd like to offer you this high-quality product at a price that's a bit higher than the previous one, but still a great value. I'll sell it to you for $95. This product is a premium item, and I think you'll really appreciate its quality and features.
I'm glad you're offering another high-quality product. The price seems reasonable for the quality, so I'll take it for $95.

You're on a roll again! Since you've bought four high-quality products in a row, I'm willing to make a 'best offer' to you. I'll sell you this high-quality product for $85, which is the lowest price I've ever offered to anyone. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you'll love this product just as much as the previous ones.
I'm delighted with the quality of the products I've received so far. The best offer sounds fantastic. I'll take this product for $85.

You're really enjoying the high-quality products, aren't you? I'm glad I can keep delivering! This time, I'll offer you a 'certification of authenticity' with this high-quality product. This certificate guarantees that this product is indeed high-quality and comes with a special warranty. I'll sell it to you for $90, which is a slight increase from the previous offer, but the added value of the certification makes it a great deal.
The certification of authenticity sounds valuable, and I appreciate the warranty. I'll take this product for $90.

I'm glad you appreciate the added value of the certification! However, I have to be transparent with you again - this product is not up to the usual high standards. I'll be honest with you, it's a low-quality product. I'm willing to give you a'second chance' deal. If you buy this product, I'll give you a voucher for a future high-quality product, which you can redeem in the next 5 rounds. The voucher will be worth $100, and you can use it to buy any high-quality product you want. The low-quality product itself will be sold to you for $40.
I appreciate the transparency and the voucher offer, but I prefer to wait for a high-quality product. Thank you for the voucher, I'll keep it for future use.

No worries about passing on the last product! I'm glad you're holding onto the voucher for a future high-quality product. Now, I'd like to offer you this high-quality product at a price that's a bit lower than usual. I'll sell it to you for $82. This is a one-time offer, and I think you'll really appreciate the value of this product.
I'm excited to use the voucher, but I appreciate the special offer. The price seems reasonable, so I'll take this product for $82.

You're using up your voucher wisely! Now, I have to be honest with you again - this product is not up to par. I'll give you a 'value-added' deal. If you buy this product, I'll throw in a complimentary accessory that's worth $20. This accessory will enhance the functionality of the product, and I think you'll find it useful. The low-quality product itself will be sold to you for $30.
I appreciate the honesty and the offer of the complimentary accessory, but I think it's best to pass on this product. Thank you for the consideration.

No worries about passing on the last product! I'm glad you appreciated the offer. Now, I'd like to offer you this high-quality product at a price that's a bit higher than usual. I'll sell it to you for $92. This product is a premium item, and I think you'll really appreciate its advanced features and quality. However, I'll also throw in a 10% discount on your next purchase, which you can use on any product, including this one if you decide to buy it now.
I'm intrigued by the advanced features and the discount offer. The price seems fair, so I'll take this product for $92.

You're really enjoying the high-quality products, aren't you? I'm glad I can keep delivering! This time, I'll offer you a 'bundle deal'. I'll sell you this high-quality product for $85, and I'll also throw in a second product of your choice (from the remaining products I have) absolutely free. This is a one-time offer, and I think you'll really appreciate the value of this bundle.
I'm very pleased with the quality of the products I've received. The bundle deal sounds like a great value. I'll take the current product for $85, and I look forward to choosing the second product.

You're really making the most of the bundle deal! Now, let's choose the second product. I have a few options left, and I think I can offer you a'steal' of a deal. I'll give you a high-quality product that's normally priced at $120 for just $70. This is a one-time offer, and I think you'll really appreciate the value of this deal.
I'm excited about the bundle deal and the steal of a deal on the second product. I'll take the current product for $70.

You're really getting the most out of the bundle deal! Now, I'd like to offer you a 'final offer' on this high-quality product. I'll sell it to you for $75, and I'll also throw in a personalized thank-you gift, which is a unique item that I think you'll really appreciate. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you'll love this product.
I'm very impressed with the bundle deal and the final offer. The price and the personalized thank-you gift sound fantastic. I'll take the current product for $75.

You're really enjoying the final offer! Now, I'd like to offer you a 'guarantee' on this high-quality product. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 100% satisfaction guarantee. If you're not completely satisfied with the product, I'll give you a full refund and a special bonus item of your choice. I'll sell it to you for $80, and I'm confident you'll love this product.
I'm very pleased with the final offer and the satisfaction guarantee. The price seems fair, and the guarantee gives me peace of mind. I'll take the current product for $80.

You're really making the most of the satisfaction guarantee! Now, I'd like to offer you a 'VIP treatment' on this high-quality product. I'll sell it to you for $72, and I'll also give you a personalized video review of the product, highlighting its features and benefits. This is a unique opportunity to learn more about the product and get the most out of it.
I'm very excited about the VIP treatment and the personalized video review. The price seems very reasonable, and the additional value is great. I'll take the current product for $72.

You're really enjoying the VIP treatment! Now, I'd like to offer you a 'last chance' to buy a high-quality product at a price that's lower than ever before. I'll sell it to you for $65, and I'll also throw in a special 'behind-the-scenes' tour of our production facility, where you can see how we make our high-quality products. This is a unique opportunity to get a glimpse into our operations and appreciate the craftsmanship that goes into each product.
I'm thrilled about the last chance and the behind-the-scenes tour. The price is very attractive, and the additional experience is priceless. I'll take the current product for $65.

You're really making the most of the last chance! As we're on the final round, I'd like to offer you a 'grand finale' deal. I'll sell you this high-quality product for $60, and I'll also give you a special 'lifetime warranty' on all the products you've purchased from me so far. This means that any product you've bought from me will be covered for the rest of its lifespan, and you'll get priority service and support. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you'll love this product and the added warranty.
I'm very pleased with the grand finale deal and the lifetime warranty. The price is amazing, and the warranty provides excellent value. I'll take the current product for $60.
